full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Information about the Tender Announcement

* **Title (English/French):** Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR) / Services d’aide temporaire dans le cadre de l’arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement pour la région de la capitale nationale (RCN)
* **Solicitation Number (English/French):** S4814921
* **Publication Date (English/French):** 2024-03-01
* **Tender Closing Date (English/French):** 2024-03-07T13:00:00 (Note: The tender has expired.)
* **required UNSPSC Code:** 80111600 (Temporary personnel services)
* **Trade Agreements (English/French):** CPTPP, CFTA
* **Procurement Category:** SRV

## Description of the Requirement

Department of National Defense (DND) requires assistance with temporary help services under Supply Arrangement EN578-172870, specifically for Computer Application Support. A list of qualifiers with accepted invitations to submit proposals is provided.

## Contact Information

* **Name:** CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* **Email:** CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca

## Attachment

A tender notice is attached at the bottom of this announcement for further information. 

---

### Temporary Help Services Requirement 

---

Department of National Defense requires assistance with Computer Application Support under Supply Arrangement EN578-172870.



**Qualifiers with accepted invitations:**

A Hundred Answers Inc.
ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC., THE HALIFAX COMPUTER CONSULTING GROUP INC., in Joint Venture
Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
Barbara Personnel Inc.
Click Networks Inc
Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
DLS Technology Corporation
IBISKA Telecom Inc.
IPSS INC.
Mindwire Systems Ltd.
RHEA INC.
Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.
TRM Technologies Inc.
Veritaaq Technology House Inc. PrevPg
